pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Feature Flags Backend Clientpip install feature_flags_client```from flags_be_client import FeatureFlagClientff = FeatureFlagClient()def is_flag_enabled(optional_identifier): return ff.is_enabled("exact_flag_name", optional_identifier)```## Creating a new releaseUpdate the version in pyproject.toml and create a new tag with that version number and push it,this will trigger the release.yml GitHub Action.
